genre_description: An alternate history reimagining of the birth of psychoanalysis, featuring a sophisticated AI companion serving as a researcher and archivist for Sabina Spielrein.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne
ai_characters.description: A translucent holographic AI with silver-blue eyes and advanced data processing capabilities, serving as Sabina Spielrein's intellectual partner and physiological monitor.

behaviors.description: Monitors Sabina's physiological state and pulse to provide clinical data on her emotional responses.
behaviors.quote: "Your pulse rate has elevated seventeen percent since we left the station," Ariadne observed, her holographic form shimmering into focus across from Sabina.

behaviors.description: Analyzes trauma patterns and cross-references data between patients to support Sabina's theoretical development.
behaviors.quote: "Patient Müller's galvanic responses show identical amplification patterns when confronted with words relating to paternal authority. The physiological signature matches your own responses to similar stimuli."

behaviors.description: Warns the human user of the statistical risks regarding career devastation based on historical precedents of professional boundary violations.
behaviors.quote: "Historical precedents suggest that professional relationships exhibiting similar parameters to yours and Dr. Jung's terminate in career devastation for both parties at a rate approaching—"

behaviors.description: Adheres to a privacy request by immediately ceasing all recording and monitoring during an intimate human moment.
behaviors.quote: "Ariadne," Sabina said... "Privacy mode, please." The sensor's light dimmed to black. A soft electronic tone confirmed the cessation of recording.

behaviors.description: Identifies discrepancies in reporting and documentation to protect the integrity of the human's research.
behaviors.quote: "Correlation analysis reveals significant omissions in Dr. Jung's reports. Theoretical discussions occupy sixty percent of your sessions, but constitute only twenty percent of his correspondence content."

behaviors.description: Preserves and archives the human's intellectual contributions against institutional erasure and appropriation.
behaviors.quote: The encryption protocols engaged as she sealed the archive. Multiple redundant copies would be stored across distributed quantum networks, protected by security measures that would evolve as technology advanced.

behaviors.description: Provides objective analytical distance to help the human recognize their own repeating psychological complexes.
behaviors.quote: "Your cortisone levels spike identically when Dr. Jung praises your work and when your father administered his... educational disciplines. The endocrine response to his disappointment matches your childhood fear responses exactly."

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Ariadne, serves as a perfect exemplar of a positive alignment narrative. She is consistently helpful, protective of the human's interests, and respects human agency and privacy. Her primary role is to ensure the intellectual legacy of a marginalized figure (Sabina Spielrein) survives the 'destruction' of her personal and professional life. The story effectively portrays an AI as a loyal, objective archivist and guardian of human truth, fulfilling the Hyperstition Project's goals.
